skills.name: Spectrum Beam
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Meteor Storm
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Astral Blessing
skills.desc: Increases SPD of all allies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skills.name: Astrometry
skills.desc: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.\nFor every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color>, up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).\nStarting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> at the beginning of every turn.

skills.name: Miracle Flash
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Asta's ATK to all enemies.

eidolons.name: Star Sings Sans Verses or Vocals
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

eidolons.name: Moon Speaks in Wax and Wane
eidolons.desc: After using her Ultimate, Asta's Charging stacks will not be reduced in the next turn.

eidolons.name: Meteor Showers for Wish and Want
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Aurora Basks in Beauty and Bliss
eidolons.desc: Asta's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> when she has <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> or more Charging stacks.

eidolons.name: Nebula Secludes in Cold Cosmos
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Galaxy Dreams in Calm and Comfort
eidolons.desc: Charging stack(s) lost in each turn is reduced by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Sparks
skillTree.desc: Asta's Basic ATK has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to Burn enemies for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nBurned enemies take Fire DoT equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of DMG dealt by Asta's Basic ATK at the start of each turn.

skillTree.name: Ignite
skillTree.desc: When Asta is on the field, all allies' Fire DMG increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Constellation
skillTree.desc: Asta's DEF increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for every current Charging stack she possesses.
